objectSets.name: First Pass - Insert/Upsert with Draft Status

objects.query: SELECT CompanyName, CurrencyIsoCode, Description, LegalEntityCity, LegalEntityCountry, LegalEntityPostalCode, LegalEntityState, LegalEntityStreet, Name, Status FROM LegalEntity
SELECT Description, DeveloperName, Language, MasterLabel, NamespacePrefix FROM TaxEngineProvider
SELECT Description, MerchantCredentialId, SellerCode, Status, TaxEngineCountry, TaxEngineGeocodeAccuracy, TaxEngineName, TaxEngineProviderId FROM TaxEngine
SELECT Description, IsTaxable, LegalEntityId, Name, ProductCode, Status, TaxCode, TaxEngineId, TaxPolicyId FROM TaxTreatment
SELECT DefaultTaxTreatmentId, Description, Name, Status, TreatmentSelection FROM TaxPolicy
